definition: the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish

sentences.english: The Codex Sinaiticus is the world's oldest surviving bible.
sentences.chinese: 西奈抄本是世界上現存最古老的聖經。

sentences.english: They left Rephidim and camped in the Desert of Sinai.
sentences.chinese: 從利非訂起行，安營在西奈的曠野。

sentences.english: And they departed from Rephidim， and pitched in the wilderness of Sinai.
sentences.chinese: 從利非訂起行，安營在西奈的曠野。

sentences.english: It is reported that Suleiman had promised to Israel for its "sweeping Sinai mountains."
sentences.chinese: 據悉，蘇萊曼曾向以色列許諾要爲其“清掃西奈山”。

sentences.english: Directed by the warlike Inanna, he penetrates the Sinai peninsula, invades Egypt.
sentences.chinese: 受到好戰的伊娜娜指引，他滲透西奈半島，入侵埃及。

sentences.english: The pilgrim route to the Christian holy places in Sinai went through the Neger.
sentences.chinese: 前往西奈聖地的朝聖路線通過內格夫。

sentences.english: They left the Desert of Sinai and camped at Kibroth Hattaavah.
sentences.chinese: 從西奈的曠野起行，安營在基博羅哈他瓦。

sentences.english: And they removed from the desert of Sinai, and pitched at Kibrothhattaavah.
sentences.chinese: 從西奈的曠野起行，安營在基博羅哈他瓦。

sentences.english: Fiel is Director of the Mount Sinai Alcohol Liver Disease Research Center.
sentences.chinese: 此外，醫生覺得是西奈山酒精肝疾病研究中心主任。

sentences.english: Some of those weapons have already appeared among militants in the Sinai Peninsula.
sentences.chinese: 部分這類武器已出現在西奈半島好戰分子的手裏。

sentences.english: Moses received the Ten Commandments from God on Mount Sinai.
sentences.chinese: 在西奈山上他從上帝那裏接受了十戒。

sentences.english: And they departed from Rephidim, and pitched in the wilderness of Sinai.
sentences.chinese: 從利非訂起行，安營在西奈的曠野。

sentences.english: Einstein climbs to the top of Mt. Sinai to get close enough to talk to God.
sentences.chinese: 愛因斯坦登上西奈山與上帝近距離交談。

definition: Rhode Island, US state/Rhodes, an island of Greece
Gaza/same as 加沙地帶|加沙地带[Jia1 sha1 di4 dai4], the Gaza strip
